messages.title: Without The Brexit Party there can be no real Brexit
messages.content: There are around 130 seats that the Conservatives haven’t won in at least 50 years. Only the Brexit Party can beat Corbyn’s Labour. Leavers, don’t waste your vote.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure a proper, clean break from the European Union.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Speaking to the tactical considerations of the constituency, the leaflet suggests that only the Brexit Party can beat the Labour party in 'around 130 seats that the Conservatives haven’t won in at least 50 years.'

issues.brexitEurope: Ensure a proper, clean break from the European Union.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet highlights the strategic importance for 'Leavers' to vote for the Brexit Party to achieve a 'real Brexit'. The content is focused on the Brexit issue and does not elaborate on other policy areas.
